mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comment ( commentId INT AUTO_INCREMENT, documentId INT, likeCount BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0, dislikeCount BOOLEAN DEFAULT 0, content TEXT NOT NULL, userId VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, regDate DATE NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (commentId), FOREIGN KEY (documentId) REFERENCES document(documentId) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=UTF8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (documentId, likeCount, dislikeCount, content, userId, regDate) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{likeCount}, #{dislikeCount}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{regDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET likeCount = #{likeCount}, dislikeCount = #{dislikeCount}, content = #{content}, userId = #{userId}, regDate = #{regDate} where commentId = #{commentId};
